home.heroSubtitle: Finally — an energy drink that delivers
home.heroDescription: without the jitters, crash, or guilt.
home.spotsLeft: Only {count} spots left for Early Bird pricing
home.naturalIngredientsDesc: No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives. Just pure, clean energy from nature.
home.zeroSugarDesc: All the energy, none of the crash. Sweetened naturally with monk fruit and stevia.
home.sustainedEnergyDesc: 150mg of natural caffeine plus adaptogens for smooth, all-day performance.
home.testimonial1: "NEON changed my life. No more afternoon crashes, just consistent energy all day long."
home.testimonial2: "Finally, an energy drink I can feel good about. The taste is incredible and the energy is real."
home.testimonial3: "I've tried every energy drink on the market. NEON is the only one that delivers without the jitters."
home.joinMovementSubtitle: Be part of the energy revolution. Pre-order now and secure your exclusive Early Bird discount.

products.title: OUR PRODUCTS
products.subtitle: Choose Your Energy
products.originalDesc: The classic NEON experience. Crisp, refreshing, and energizing.
products.citrusDesc: Zesty lemon-lime with a tropical twist. Summer in a can.
products.berryDesc: Mixed berries with a hint of pomegranate. Sweet and powerful.

about.title: OUR STORY
about.subtitle: The NEON Revolution
about.missionText: To revolutionize the energy drink industry by providing clean, natural, and effective energy solutions that empower people to reach their full potential.
about.visionText: A world where everyone has access to healthy, sustainable energy that fuels their dreams and ambitions without compromise.
about.value1Desc: We believe in complete transparency about our ingredients and processes.
about.value2Desc: Only the highest quality, natural ingredients make it into our products.
about.value3Desc: We're constantly innovating to bring you the best energy experience possible.
about.value4Desc: Building a community of like-minded individuals who value health and performance.
